products.name: Chewable Paan Kapsul
products.description: Experience the traditional taste of paan in a modern, convenient format. Our chewable paan capsules deliver authentic flavor without tobacco or stains - perfect for the modern lifestyle!

products.name: Immunity Ginger Shots
products.description: Powerful immunity-boosting ginger shots with an irresistible chalpata flavor. Each shot delivers concentrated wellness benefits to keep you energized and protected all day long.

products.name: Gas Go Relief Candy
products.description: Traditional digestive candy that provides instant gas relief using our grandmother's time-tested ancient recipe. Made with love and heritage herbs for natural digestive wellness.
